NewsItem.HEADLINE: Small Cells 2017 Forecast Update 2
NewsItem.SUMMARY: These files provide a quarterly update to the Mobile Experts small cell forecast, for January 2018. The five-year forecast (2017-2022) is updated with final numbers for 2017, including shipments, revenue, market share, and other key factors.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: Breakdowns include residential/enterprise/carrier deployment, indoor vs outdoor, DRS vs RRH vs small cell, regional breakdowns, and market share tracking in key categories.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: Small cell RRH low power base station enodeB LTE forecast update market trend market share revenue shipment pricing ASP
